```

  ✖ Provide an onBlur event instead of an onChange event unless absolutely necessary.

    <select onChange={() => {}} />
            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ The onBlur event is more declarative and reliable for indicating input changes when using
    keyboard navigation.


```
